column1: '''Tar-Anárion''' was the eighth ruler of [[Númenor]], succeeding his mother, [[Tar-Ancalimë]] (being the first ruling Queen). His name means "Son of the Sun". His father was [[Hallacar]].<ref>{{UT
Little is said about Tar-Anárion's rule. His two eldest children were female, but both declined the throne for uncertain reasons, and they disliked and feared [[Tar-Ancalimë
column2: Ancalimë]], who would refuse to let them marry. Therefore he was succeeded by his son, [[Tar-Súrion]].<ref>{{UT
